                        Web Developer
                        Hi, I'm Will Shahda — I develop plugins, themes, and web applications.
                    
                
            
        


        
            
                
                    
                        
                            Services
                        
                    
                
            
            
                
                    
                        Plugins & Themes
                        Wordpress
                        The most ubiquitous CMS on the web. Whether you need a custom Theme or a Plugin to add innovative new features, I have you covered.
                        Shopify
                        The quickest, simplest way to start selling products online. Take advantage of my experience with Shopify Themes and the Shopify API to take your store to the next level.
                    
                    
                        Web Applications
                        LAMP
                        Linux, Apache, MySQL, and PHP — the gold standard of web development. If you value reliability, there is no better option.
                        MEAN
                        The MongoDB, ExpressJS, AngularJS, and NodeJS stack is the latest in cutting edge web technology. If you need to push boundries, you need to get MEAN.
                    
                
            
        

        
            
                
                    
                        
                            Case Studies
                        
                    
                
            
            
                
                    
                        Kraken RumWooCommerce Theme & Plugin
                        The WooCommerce Theme developed for Kraken Rum includes custom post types for cocktail recipes, films, and downloads. Implementation of the Films page and hero video required integration with the YouTube API.
                        The Kraken Content Stream Plugin was developed to display an endless stream of masonry content using shortcodes.
                        View Site
                    
                    
                        
                    
                
                
                    
                        OperativeWordpress Theme
                        The Operative Wordpress Theme is fully responsive and was implemented with a variety of custom fields to allow the client to manage every aspect of content.
                        Integration with the HubSpot API was used for tracking user experience and landing page conversions.
                        View Site
                    
                    
                        
                    
                
                
                    
                        Proximo Store LocatorWordpress Plugin
                        This Wordpress plugin was implemented using Google's Map and Geocoding APIs in combination with a 3rd party API to provide a user friendly way of finding locations to buy various brands of liquor managed by Proximo.
                        The plugin is highly customizable and currently in use by a variety of brands, featured here is the Boodles Gin Store Locator.
                        View Site
                    
                    
                        
                    
                
            
        

        
            
                
                    
                        
                            Get In Touch!
